questions.question: When I'm feeling down, this uplifts me more

options.choice: Receiving a warm hug
Hearing my partner reminding me of my strengths

questions.question: The action from my partner that I treasure more

options.choice: Spending a quiet evening together
Them organizing a surprise party with my closest friends & family to celebrate me

questions.question: The surprise from my partner that would make my day

options.choice: Them surprising me with a handwritten love letter
Them taking me on a road trip for the weekend

questions.question: The expression of love that resonates with me more

options.choice: My partner holding the umbrela for me
My partner expressing their love verbally

questions.question: The gesture from my partner that makes me feel cherished

options.choice: Them presenting me with a photo album filled with memories of our time together
Them cooking my favorite meal

questions.question: My prefered way to spend quality time with my partner

options.choice: Engaging in meaningful conversations and sharing thoughts and feelings
Being physically close, whether it's cuddling on the couch or sitting in the park

questions.question: This makes me connected to my partner the most

options.choice: Cooking a new recepe together
Exchanging little gifts unexpectedly

questions.question: The action from my partner that makes me feel most cared for

options.choice: Them preparing my lunch box with love and care
Them telling me how much I mean to them

questions.question: This gesture makes me feel most loved

options.choice: Holding hands while walking
My partner surprising me with breakfast in bed

questions.question: The gesture from my partner that makes me feel valued

options.choice: Them surprising me with a handwritten love letter expressing their feelings for me
Them helping me with my hobby even though that doesn't interest them

questions.question: I feel more appreciated when

options.choice: My partner helps me with chores or tasks
My partner showering me with compliments

questions.question: When I'm sick, this would make me feel better

options.choice: My partner staying by my side and cudling me
My partner bringing me my favorite comfort food

questions.question: When I'm feeling overwhelmed, this would calm me down

options.choice: My partner giving me a relaxing massage
My partner making me a cup of my favorite drink

questions.question: I feel most valued when

options.choice: My partner surprise me with a bouquet of my favorite flowers
My partner tells me how much they appreciate me and all that I do

questions.question: When I'm apart from my partner, I prefer

options.choice: Writing heartfelt messages or letters to each other
Video calls or phone calls to see and hear each other

questions.question: The expression of love from my partner that I cherish the most

options.choice: Them spending quality time with me, even if it's just watching TV together
Them surprising me with a piece of artwork that reminds them of me

questions.question: When I'm feeling anxious, this would reassure me the most

options.choice: My partner holding me close and comforting me
My partner reminding me of all my strengths and capabilities

questions.question: I feel appreciated when

options.choice: My partner leaves me heartfelt notes around the house
Them organizing my workspace to make it more comfortable

questions.question: The expression of love from my partner that brings me the most joy

options.choice: That cute "Good morning" every single day
Them gifting me a personalized item with my name or a special message engraved on it

questions.question: I feel more understood by my partner when

options.choice: They offering to finish what I started
They actively listen and validate my feelings

questions.question: I feel most connected to my partner when

options.choice: Spending a lazy Sunday morning cuddling in bed
Having a romantic dinner together at home

questions.question: My heart skips a beat when

options.choice: Surprise kiss when I least expect it
Them preparing my favourite meal just to see me smile

questions.question: The actions from my partner that would make me feel most loved

options.choice: My partner spending time discussing my dreams and goals
Surprising me with tickets to a concert of my favourite band

questions.question: I feel most loved by my partner when

options.choice: They give me their full attention when I'm talking
They hold me close when I'm feeling vulnerable

questions.question: This excites me the most when

options.choice: My partner puts their arm around me in public
My partner buys me a dress I've always wanted
